# Ego-Kernel Protocol and Whitepaper

| Document | Description |

| [Manifesto.md](./Manifesto.md) | The Sovereign Protocol Declaration - the philosophy, the why, and the Sovereign's Oath |
| [EK1-Whitepaper.md](./EK1-Whitepaper.md) | Full technical specification - all formulas, architecture diagrams, protocol definitions, and the MVP roadmap |

## Sovereign Integrity

#### We believe in Open Source, but we also believe in sustainable development. The BUSL 1.1 allows us to prevent the 'Big Tech Vampirism' of 2024-2025, ensuring that the value generated by the Ego-Kernel stays with the Architects and the Users.
